title: I need identify this font please
content:
Hello Dear fiends

I need identify this font please

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104225241im_/http:/typophile.com/files/canales_6511.jpg)
author: fas80

comments.content: It must be **[Unispace (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104225241/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Unispace%20-%20Bold&fid=df3b215d06e171cab465bd401db82a57&fsize=60&text=CANALES%20I&fit=1)** free font by Ray Larabie ( [Typodermic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104225241/http:/typodermicfonts.com/), 2000), condensed by e.g. 40%

Yes Sir!

apparently that is the font! weeks to find

many many thankssss
